settings.title: Frequency of child concept observations
settings.description: This scriptlet computes the fraction of child concept observations on top level concept observations of the specified patient set. So please drag and drop one patient set on "Patient Set 1", one top level concept on "Concept 1" and one child concept of "Concept 1" on the additional input field below.

input.name: Child concept
input.description: Drag and drop a child concept here

output.name: Relative frequency of observations of child concept
output.description: Computed by #(Child concept observations) / #(Top level concept observations)
